definition: frame (e.g. door frame)/casing/fig. framework/template/to circle (i.e. draw a circle around sth)/to frame/to restrict/Taiwan pr. [kuang1]

sentences.chinese: 我超爱龟甲色的眼镜框。

sentences.english: He looked at me over the tops of his spectacles.
sentences.chinese: 他从眼镜框的上方看了看我。

sentences.english: Frame of mirror polished solid stainless steel 10mm or 12mm.
sentences.chinese: 抛光的镜框固体不锈钢10mm或12毫米。

sentences.english: The bevel of that picture frame was damaged.
sentences.chinese: 那个镜框的斜角已被损坏了。

sentences.english: Her Cannes frames epitomise elegance and timeless classiness.
sentences.chinese: 她在戛纳戴的镜框呈现出优雅和永恒的时髦感。

sentences.english: Loesser reached forward and lifted a picture frame off his desk and handed it to her.
sentences.chinese: Loesser走向前，拿起书桌上的镜框，递给她。

sentences.english: Yes, they are a pair of brown ladies hornrimmed spectacles with blue tinted lenses.
sentences.chinese: 好的，那是一副棕色质镜框女用眼镜，蓝色镜片。

sentences.english: But they have to read the  panel in a mirror.
sentences.chinese: 他们要读出镜框内的视力表。

sentences.english: The picture was framed in light oak.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画用黑色镜框框起来会好看的。

sentences.english: Yes, they are a pair of brown ladies horn rimmed glasses with blur tinted lenses.
sentences.chinese: 好的，那是一副色角质镜框女用眼镜，蓝色镜片。

sentences.english: On colour, white metope can hang shallow brown or flaxen picture frame.
sentences.chinese: 在色彩上，白色墙面可挂浅棕色或淡黄色镜框。

sentences.english: Most such fashionistas go for cheap frames sold on the street.
sentences.chinese: 多数爱赶时髦的人都买街边卖的便宜镜框。

sentences.english: Square frames will also slim down your wide cheekbones and eye area.
sentences.chinese: 方形镜框则会让你较宽的颧骨和眼部看起来略显消瘦。

sentences.english: We have many different kinds of frames here.
It was about two feet long and framed in wood.
sentences.chinese: 它大约两英尺长，木制的镜框。

sentences.english: The hyperopia mirror's picture frame also has many fashion choices.
sentences.chinese: 远视镜的镜框也有许多时尚的选择。

definition: black frame (around a funerary portrait or obituary)
cosmetic contact lens/big eye contact lens/circle contact lens
